inquisitr.com/2015/04/turmeric-can-fight.title: Turmeric Can Fight Oral And Cervical Cancer, Says Study...
inquisitr.com/2015/04/turmeric-can-fight.snippet: Turmeric is able to slow the expression of HPV in infected oral cancer cells by downregulating the levels of cellular transcription factors of NF-KB and AP-1. These findings suggest that curcumin could in fact control the extent of an HPV infection.
